node.title: Child rescued from alleged porn operation, as man faces 43 charges
node.alt: Man in grey shirt, blue jeans, and thongs sits in a dark grey ute, his face blurred
node.description: A child has been rescued, and a man from the Sunshine Coast has been charged with more than 40 child abuse offences, including rape, after a five-day police operation.Â
node.content: ["A child has been rescued by police, and a man charged with dozens of offences, including allegedly sexually abusing the child, and creating encrypted exploitation material that he shared with\u00a0others.\u00a0", "Police have released video showing the 30-year-old man being met at his door by police and taken into custody on Queensland's Sunshine Coast.", "He is facing 43 child abuse-related offences, including multiple counts of rape, indecent treatment of a child, and making and distributing child exploitation material.", "He has been remanded in custody, and will face court in Gympie next month.", "Detective Acting Inspector Cameron Burke said every time someone viewed\u00a0or shared\u00a0child exploitation images, it directly contributed\u00a0to a child's suffering.", "\"These children are re-victimised every time someone downloads and shares an image,\" Acting Inspector Burke said.", "Two other men were also charged, after the Child Abuse and Sexual Crime Group's Argo team executed search warrants across the Sunshine Coast as part of a five-day operation this week.", "A 49-year-old Eumundi man and a 25-year-old Yandina man have also been charged with possessing and sharing child exploitation material.", "They\u00a0are both due to face court in Maroochydore later this month."]
